Config.Name: WebUI Port
Config.Description: Port for the DDC Web Interface (default: 9374)

Config.Name: Admin Password
Config.Description: Web UI Admin Password (Username: admin) - Default is 'setup' - CHANGE IMMEDIATELY after first login!

Config.Name: Flask Secret Key
Config.Description: Secure random key for Flask sessions - IMPORTANT: Generate with 'openssl rand -hex 32' and set this for production! Leave empty for auto-generation (less secure).

Config.Name: Discord Bot Token (Optional)
Config.Description: OPTIONAL: Discord bot token - Can also be configured via Web UI after startup. Create bot at https://discord.com/developers/applications

Config.Name: Config Directory
Config.Description: DDC configuration files (bot tokens, channel settings, etc.)

Config.Name: Docker Socket
Config.Description: Docker socket for container management - REQUIRED
